rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports culling numbers factually without using high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports the scale of culling but lacks explicit calming language.
No bare negation or statement of absence/unlikelihood.
Reports a count of culled poultry using a standard verb: "resulted in the culling of more than 23 million poultry".
